name: Space Fight 3000!
description:
Kill alien scum!

A turn-based space-based physics-based alien blast em up from the fourth dimension. Control your space soldiers with the arrow keys (or WSAD), and shoot using the mouse. Right mouse drags the screen, and space ends the turn.
Adventure forth soldier!
Thanks for Playing!

This game was made in 72 hours as part of Ludum Dare 30 (August 22nd-25th, 2014). It was a collaboration between the following:

eskoala : graphics, sound + misc coding
hnjslat : ai, gameplay
pillbrain : weapons, UI, levels
tompudding : physics, teleporter-trons
